value.name: Man jailed after being found with knife in Wood End
value.description: A man found with a large kitchen knife in Wood End has been sent to prison. Rocky Fawkner was jailed at Coventry Magistrates' Court after he pleaded guilty to a charge of possession of an offensive weapon in a public place.

value.name: Mountaineers hook the Longhorns, 8-3
value.description: Additionally, junior second baseman Kyle Gray extended his team-best and career-long hit streak to 18 games and his reached-base streak to 19 games with one hit, an RBI, two runs scored and a walk.
